title: A Fowl Anthology of Limericks
description: Yes, the lim'rick packs laughs anatomicalInto space that is quite economical.But the good ones I've seenVery seldom were clean,And the clean ones were not very comical.A lim'rick can be most spectacular,Expressing thoughts in the vernacular.With words so impure,It's like verbal manure;It often turns out to be crapular.
author: B.K. Bluebird
